name: Flash game website builder script
short_description:
Note: If you need full automated php game script with 80,000 games then visit https://sourceforge.net/projects/flashgamesscript/

Make your own gaming empire and start making money online absolutely for free. Convert any free hosted Google’s blogger blog to auto updated flash arcade game archive. We all love gaming and want to start our own games websites (but without money) that’s why I made this free script. It does not need any hosting provider (investment) to host your site. Just download the script, create a few blogger.com free blogs (unlimited blogs/ posting supported), edit the setting files with your details, start posting and monetize your sites with ppc (adsense policy supported) or any kind of ads. You can manually run the script or task schedule it to run it automatically to update all of your blogs with unique seo friendly contents at a regular interval. There is nothing to install. Download the script archive file; extract and start using. by boysofts.com
summary: Free flash arcade game archive web site builder/creator tool.
